Content.title: Stewart Twynham
Content.name: Stewart Twynham
Content.bodyText:
Hi Darren,

I'm based up here in (sunny!) Manchester and am delighted with Umbraco... despite having developed using linux / CGI / perl / php for over a decade, I've been a convert to C#.net over the last few years.  Other .net based CMS platforms such as DNN and Rainbow simply don't give you the 100% control over the HTML that Umbraco does.
I'm now looking to launch Umbraco based sites for several customers where accessibility / SEO / etc are critical.

Regards,

Stewart
